actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain real property adjacent to the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site in Greeneville, Tennessee, for inclusion within the national cemetery located in that site.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation specified lands in Greene County, Tennessee, for inclusion within the national cemetery in the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site, Greeneville, Tennessee.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain real property adjacent to the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site in Greeneville, Tennessee, for inclusion within the national cemetery located in that site.
